category: Herbs That Clear Heat and Purge Fire

indications: Edema, jaundice, diabetes, urinary retention, carbuncles, malignant furuncle, scabies

notes: This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It is said to cure diabetes, pyogenic sores and nasolaryngeal cancer.
It is also said to treat gingivitis and gingivalgia.
In low dosage, it is used to treat rubella.
